verses.verse: And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> were gathered <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H5594>lamented<s%> him, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran.<s%>

And there was a <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H4584>Maon,<s%> whose <S%H4639>possessions<s%> were in <S%H3760>Carmel;<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> and he had <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5795>goats:<s%> and he <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H1494>shearing<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in <S%H3760>Carmel.<s%>

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H5037>Nabal;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H26>Abigail:<s%> and she was a <S%H802>woman<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding,<s%> and of a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H8389>countenance:<s%> but the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H7186>churlish<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%> in his <S%H4611>doings;<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> was of the house of <S%H3612>Caleb.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H5037>Nabal<s%> did <S%H1494>shear<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> sent <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> young <S%H5288>men,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the young <S%H5288>men,<s%> Get you <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5037>Nabal,<s%> and <S%H7592>greet<s%> <S%H7965><s%> him in my name: <S%H8034><s%>

And <S%H3541>thus<s%> shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> to him that <S%H2416>liveth<s%> in prosperity, <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be both to <S%H859>thee,<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> be to thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> be unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast.

And <S%H6258>now<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast <S%H1494>shearers:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> thy <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> us, we <S%H3637>hurt<s%> them <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> was there <S%H3972>aught<s%> <S%H6485>missing<s%> unto them, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>while<s%> they <S%H1961>were<s%> in <S%H3760>Carmel.<s%>

Ask <S%H7592><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy young <S%H5288>men,<s%> and they will <S%H5046>show<s%> thee. Wherefore let the young <S%H5288>men<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> we <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H5414>give,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>whatsoever<s%> <S%H4672>cometh<s%> to thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and to thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And when <S%H1732>David's<s%> young <S%H5288>men<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5037>Nabal<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H5117>ceased.<s%>

And <S%H5037>Nabal<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H1732>David?<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> is the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse?<s%> there be <S%H7231>many<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> now a <S%H3117>days<s%> that break <S%H6555>away<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> his <S%H113>master.<s%>

Shall I then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and my <S%H4325>water,<s%> and my <S%H2878>flesh<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H2873>killed<s%> for my <S%H1494>shearers,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H335>whence<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> be?

So <S%H1732>David's<s%> young <S%H5288>men<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H1870>way,<s%> and went <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1697>sayings.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H376>men,<s%> Gird ye <S%H2296>on<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2719>sword.<s%> And they girded <S%H2296>on<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> girded <S%H2296>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2719>sword:<s%> and there went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> about <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3627>stuff.<s%>

But <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5288><s%> of the young <S%H4480>men<s%> <S%H5288><s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H26>Abigail,<s%> <S%H5037>Nabal's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> out of the <S%H4480>wilderness<s%> <S%H4057><s%> to <S%H1288>salute<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H113>master;<s%> and he <S%H5860>railed<s%> on them.

But the <S%H376>men<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> unto us, and we were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3637>hurt,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H6485>missed<s%> we any <S%H3972>thing,<s%> as long <S%H3605>as<s%> <S%H3117><s%> we were <S%H1980>conversant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, when we <S%H1961>were<s%> in the fields: <S%H7704><s%>

They <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> us <S%H1571>both<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H3119>day,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>while<s%> we <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them <S%H7462>keeping<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H7200>consider<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> thou wilt <S%H6213>do;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H3615>determined<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> our <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>household:<s%> for <S%H1931>he<s%> is such a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> that a man cannot <S%H4480>speak<s%> <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him.

Then <S%H26>Abigail<s%> made <S%H4116>haste,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3899>loaves,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5035>bottles<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> ready <S%H6213>dressed,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H7039>parched<s%> corn, and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> clusters of <S%H6778>raisins,<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> cakes of <S%H1690>figs,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H2543>asses.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto her <S%H5288>servants,<s%> Go <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me; <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you. But she <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H5037>Nabal.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>was<s%> so, as <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H7392>rode<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H2543>ass,<s%> that she came <S%H3381>down<s%> by the <S%H5643>covert<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H376>men<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> her; and she <S%H6298>met<s%> them.

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> in <S%H8267>vain<s%> have I <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> fellow hath in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> so that <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> was <S%H6485>missed<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> pertained unto him: and he hath <S%H7725>requited<s%> me <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>

So <S%H3541><s%> and <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H3541>also<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> unto the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H7604>leave<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> pertain to him <S%H5704>by<s%> the morning <S%H1242>light<s%> any that <S%H8366>pisseth<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

And when <S%H26>Abigail<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> she <S%H4116>hasted,<s%> and <S%H3381>lighted<s%> <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H639>before<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H6440>face,<s%> and bowed <S%H7812>herself<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%>

And <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Upon <S%H589>me,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> upon me let this <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> be: and let thine <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> in thine <S%H241>audience,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of thine <S%H519>handmaid.<s%>

Let <S%H408>not<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H7760>regard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> even <S%H5037>Nabal:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> as his <S%H8034>name<s%> is, <S%H3651>so<s%> is <S%H1931>he;<s%> <S%H5037>Nabal<s%> is his <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H5039>folly<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> him: but <S%H589>I<s%> thine <S%H519>handmaid<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> of my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou didst <S%H7971>send.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, my <S%H113>lord,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> and as thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H834>seeing<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H4513>withheld<s%> thee from <S%H4480>coming<s%> <S%H935><s%> to shed <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and from <S%H3467>avenging<s%> thyself with thine own <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> let thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and they that <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H5037>Nabal.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> hath <S%H935>brought<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord,<s%> let it even be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto the young <S%H5288>men<s%> that <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H7272><s%> my <S%H113>lord.<s%>

I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H5375>forgive<s%> the <S%H6588>trespass<s%> of thine <S%H519>handmaid:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will certainly <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6213><s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> a <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H3898>fighteth<s%> the <S%H4421>battles<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H4672>found<s%> in thee all thy <S%H4480>days.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Yet a <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H6965>risen<s%> to <S%H7291>pursue<s%> thee, and to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5315>soul:<s%> but the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6887>bound<s%> in the <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God;<s%> and the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> them shall he sling <S%H7049>out,<s%> as out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H7050>sling.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall have <S%H6213>done<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> thee, and shall have <S%H6680>appointed<s%> thee <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

That <S%H2063>this<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6330>grief<s%> unto thee, nor <S%H4383>offense<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord,<s%> either that thou hast <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H2600>causeless,<s%> or that my <S%H113>lord<s%> hath <S%H3467>avenged<s%> himself: but when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall have dealt <S%H3190>well<s%> with my <S%H113>lord,<s%> then <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H519>handmaid.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H26>Abigail,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> thee <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> me:

And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be thy <S%H2940>advice,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> hast <S%H3607>kept<s%> me <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4480>coming<s%> <S%H935><s%> to shed <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and from <S%H3467>avenging<s%> myself with mine own <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

For in very <S%H199>deed,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> hath kept me <S%H4513>back<s%> from <S%H4480>hurting<s%> <S%H7489><s%> thee, <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H3884><s%> thou hadst <S%H4116>hasted<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> me, <S%H3588>surely<s%> there had <S%H518>not<s%> been <S%H3498>left<s%> unto <S%H5037>Nabal<s%> <S%H5704>by<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> any that <S%H8366>pisseth<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> of her <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> she had <S%H935>brought<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Go <S%H5927>up<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> to thine <S%H1004>house;<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> I have <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to thy <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and have <S%H5375>accepted<s%> thy <S%H6440>person.<s%>

But it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> when the <S%H3196>wine<s%> was gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Nabal,<s%> <S%H5037><s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> had <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him, and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> as a <S%H68>stone.<s%>
And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> about <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> after, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5062>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5037>Nabal,<s%> that he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
